name: Car Drift Dynamic
description:
What is Dynamic Drift :

Dynamic Drift is just the beginning of an era of non-stop car drifting, where you go full throttle with nitro and dive into this fever of drifting.  It supports any types of controllers ( Mobile, Keyboard, XBOX and PS4 ) in order to make your best drifting experience. 

Get ready to drive high-performance cars and make them drift at high speed in tracks designed specifically for drifting. Drift Points grow proportionally to drift angle, drift time and speed. If points reach every multiple of 100 again, Drift Combo is increased by 1 again. This works only if you keep drifting without too long interruptions between one drift and the another (less than 1 second), otherwise Drift Combo multiplier will be reset to 1. Proximity multiplier is increased when you drift with the back of the car near a wall (less than 1.5 meters) proportionally to closeness. You'll notice this bonus with a slow motion effect and a text showing the multiplier factor. If you hit anything you'll lose your partial points and all multipliers. The Drifting  Game is also combined with stunning visuals and high-fidelity graphics. 

Improve your racing and drifting skills. Get ready for the most Realistic and Exciting Drift Experience of all time. If you are in the mood for drifting, you came to the right place. It’s always drifting time! Let's go driver !!!

Dynamic Drift features :
  • 8 Cars with Realistic Drift Physics
  • Counting Drifting Score
  • Realistic Engine Sounds ( i3, i4, i6, v8, v10 ) 
  • Manual and Automatic Gearbox
  • Mobile , PC,  XBOX, PS4,  Steering Wheel Interface and Controllers
  • Car Driving Assistants ( ABS, ESP, TCS, SH )
  • Car Display ( Speedometer, Tachometer, NOS, Turbo ) 
  • Customizable Cars ( Wheel Changer, Colour Changer )
  • Car Configurations ( Maximum Speed, Brake and Torque, Drivetrain Selector ( AWD, FWD, RWD )  )
  • Car NOS and Turbo
  • Insane HD Graphics and Post Processing
Dynamic Drift Gameplay : THE VIDEO QUALITY DOES NOT REPRESENT THE REAL IN-GAME GRAPHICS Game Instructions : Keyboard Keybinds:  "W, A, S, D" to Control the Car ; "ESC" to access the Menu ; "SPACE" to use Handbrake ; "G" to use Slow-Motion ; "F" to Nitro ; Created By DriftWorks
